rtm-confirm-delete.legend: Please confirm you wish to remove this web address from your report

url.label: Enter the specific web address that contains the material
url.hint: The web address can be found at the top of the browser window and usually starts with "www.", "http://" or "https://".

location.label: Where exactly on the page is the material (optional)?
location.short: Where on the page is the material?
location.hint: Is the material in a photo or is it written? Is it at the top or the bottom of the page? If it is in a social media feed, who posted the material and when (time and date)?

description.label: Tell us more about the material you found (optional)
description.short: Tell us more about the material
description.hint: How did you find the material? Do you know any details that would help us investigate, such as the names or locations of the people involved?

anonymous.legend: Can we contact you for more information?

no.label: Yes, I'll add my contact details
